title: Stuck at logging in....
body:
Since 7.30pm last night i have been trying to log into league and it seems to not work.


Tried again at 3.30am and didnt work still

Then again at 7.30 Same issue

4pm: Still not logging in

Can a Rioter please take a look.

replies.body:
As asked For Pics

Beta First Pic/Connection
http://imgur.com/a/KPZgl


Beta Stuck at Second Login -- Authenticating
http://imgur.com/a/uJGJa



Legacy Client:
http://imgur.com/a/xWyg1




Port Fowarded All my Ports for League also.

Internet Provider Foxtel NBN

This seems to be a widespread issue, but to continue using the game, Launch the Legacy Client... A link to launch the Legacy Client can be found under the Login Section of the New Client after attempting to login.

You should be able to use and login to the Legacy Client without problems! Let us know how you go!

http://imgur.com/a/FQxcC
